title: Specter Protocol Unleashed
story_summary: In 2025, the city of Stenograd is ruled not by politicians, but by algorithms - its people's lives shaped by the Behavioral Compliance Index, the silent system Marek Halden built to make governance feel as seamless as infrastructure itself. When Halden is found dead, strange messages - his so-called 'Echoes' - begin to slip through the city's networks, unsettling a population schooled in quiet adaptation. As rumors pulse and Council factions fracture, journalist Rada Miskovic amplifies the uncertainty, igniting citywide debate about the system's fairness. Then a hidden archive of 'ghost' BCI profiles surfaces, revealing that hundreds once erased by the system still live in its shadow, fueling panic as residents realize the network may serve unseen hands. When the scoring protocols suddenly flip, throwing loyal citizens into exile and lifting outcasts into privilege, Stenograd descends into chaos. Now, as old ghosts reemerge with stories of vanished lives and memory-erasure protocols threaten to erase the truth itself, the city's fractured people unite in protest, demanding new answers - and forcing the Council to face the cost of a society steered by memory and algorithm instead of trust.

official.headline: Panel Testimonies Falter
official.anchor_line: Citizen hearings paused as participants report temporary memory disruptions. Inquiry will resume following stability checks.
official.contextual_reframing: Continued safeguards reinforce the city's commitment to transparent, well-regulated civic participation.

official.headline: Public Unrest Builds
official.anchor_line: Spontaneous gatherings form across the city as concern rises over missing testimony records.
official.contextual_reframing: Authorities monitor citizen concerns to strengthen trust and promote long-term unity in the restoration process.

official.headline: Council Faces Reckoning
official.anchor_line: Council members openly address the consequences of memory loss as the inquiry into governance intensifies.
official.contextual_reframing: This moment demonstrates the system's capacity for self-reflection and responsible adaptation toward greater accountability.

underground.headline: Testimonies Wiped Live
underground.anchor_line: Ghosts on the stand suddenly forget everything  -  the truth vanishes in real time.
underground.contextual_reframing: It's not a glitch. Rumors say the system is deleting memories on purpose. How many more stories will be lost forever?

underground.headline: Anger In The Streets
underground.anchor_line: Thousands gather. Silence from the top. Demands grow louder for answers and justice.
underground.contextual_reframing: This is what happens when you erase the past: people fight to reclaim it. Trust in the system is cracking and everyone feels it.

underground.headline: Council Cornered By Truth
underground.anchor_line: The Council can't dodge it  -  Specter Protocol erased evidence to protect itself. Everything is unraveling.
underground.contextual_reframing: The foundation has finally been exposed. Will accountability ever come, or is this just the first blackout of many?
